nodes.bodyText: If we're going to remove the return for the method, then we should probably rename it as it no longer returns a copied tree.  When I originally wrote this I thought it would be useful to have an iterative method for copying a Jexl tree.  So, that's why it returns the copied tree even though we don't actually use it anywhere - yet!  I could see an iterative copy method being useful in the future though, so my thought would be to leave this method as-is and return the copied tree.  Just my 2 cents.
@jwomeara thanks for clarifying. I've restored the return value for this method.
